title: Hands-on: LINESTAND MagSafe charger for iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch offers floating and lay-flat design
content:
After unveiling a look at its new MagSafe charger back at CES, LINE has launched the unique LINESTAND. Built from a solid block of aluminum, the 3-in-1 charger for iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch works flat on a surface or floats with a VESA mount. Read on for our hands-on details.

moreâ€¦

The post Hands-on: LINESTAND MagSafe charger for iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch offers floating and lay-flat design appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Hands-on with the new LINESTAND MagSafe 3-in-1 charger for iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch which offers a floating or lay-flat design.
